channel.title: ParadoxRS 23 skills Summoning Pking Skilling
channel.description:
[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=6][COLOR="#00FF00"]Welcome all to ParadoxRS[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Links[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE] [CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Website: [url=http://www.paradoxrs.com]Paradoxrs[/url][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Download Now: [URL=http://"http://www.paradoxrs.com/Dlvx1.1.jar"]http://www.paradoxrs.com/Dlvx1.1.jar[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Play Now: [url=http://www.paradoxrs.com/webclient.html]Paradoxrs[/url][/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Forums: [url=http://www.paradoxrs.com/forums]ParadoxRS[/url][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Information[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][/COLOR][CENTER]Hey guys welcome to my server Paradox. Here we are striving to make players, play to the max. We want the player to feel like there in control, were they can fight bosses, training,fighting with all their friends. Doing slayer task all those things together with everyone in any way. So we implemented many system on how you can do that. Yes we added Clan chat ranks, Duo slayer,just amazing things that can make the game better from many views, or atleast a view from us![/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Game[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE] [FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][/COLOR][CENTER]The game can be played in many ways, ranging from putting the client in different data of your choice. The way how fast you gain xp to how slow you gain xp. We want this game to be played in many ways and add many options so you can customize your game to the way you want. That was we strive for now we have many features we are going to list below. Hope you enjoy the photos and the features![/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Features[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#00FF00"][B][CENTER]- Summoning (working scrolls and pouches) - Dungeoneernig - Duo-Slayer - Amazing combat - Quick curses and prayer - Great swithcing for pking - Different expierence rates - Autocasting - Completionist cape colors - Full Clan chat system - Summoining BoBs - Fully working castle wars - Player titles - Hunter Skill - Many bosses - Lots of minigames - Online 24/7 - Barely any bugs - Smooth gameplay - Blast Furnace - Running a 24/7 VPS[/CENTER][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Pictures[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
Working Summoning [CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/2hcqd11.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Clan Chat [CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/28rksd1.png[/img][/CENTER]
Pk point store [CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2up8jg7.png[/img][/CENTER]
Flawless Agility [CENTER][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/ixd2sz.png[/img][/CENTER]
Bank Tabs [CENTER][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/10ofjm8.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Blast Furnace [CENTER][IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2dvvpu8.jpg[/img][/CENTER]
Working Completionist cape colors [CENTER][IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/nphsnl.png[/img][/CENTER]

item.title: ParadoxRS 23 skills Summoning Pking Skilling
item.dc:creator: @luigipwnz12 luigipwnz12
item.description:
@luigipwnz12 wrote:

[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=6][COLOR="#00FF00"]Welcome all to ParadoxRS[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Links[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[CENTER][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Website: Paradoxrs[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Download Now: [URL=http://“http://www.paradoxrs.com/Dlvx1.1.jar”]http://www.paradoxrs.com/Dlvx1.1.jar[/URL][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Play Now: Paradoxrs[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3]Forums: ParadoxRS[/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Information[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][/COLOR][CENTER]Hey guys welcome to my server Paradox. Here we are striving to make players, play to the max. We want the player to feel like there in control, were they can fight bosses, training,fighting with all their friends. Doing slayer task all those things together with everyone in any way. So we implemented many system on how you can do that. Yes we added Clan chat ranks, Duo slayer,just amazing things that can make the game better from many views, or atleast a view from us![/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Game[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=3][COLOR="#FFFFFF"][/COLOR][CENTER]The game can be played in many ways, ranging from putting the client in different data of your choice. The way how fast you gain xp to how slow you gain xp. We want this game to be played in many ways and add many options so you can customize your game to the way you want. That was we strive for now we have many features we are going to list below. Hope you enjoy the photos and the features![/CENTER][/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=2][COLOR="#FF0000"][CENTER]Features[/CENTER][/COLOR][/SIZE]

[FONT=Arial Black][COLOR="#00FF00"][B][CENTER]- Summoning (working scrolls and pouches)

  • Dungeoneernig
  • Duo-Slayer
  • Amazing combat
  • Quick curses and prayer
  • Great swithcing for pking
  • Different expierence rates
  • Autocasting
  • Completionist cape colors
  • Full Clan chat system
  • Summoining BoBs
  • Fully working castle wars
  • Player titles
  • Hunter Skill
  • Many bosses
  • Lots of minigames
  • Online 24/7
  • Barely any bugs
  • Smooth gameplay
  • Blast Furnace
  • Running a 24/7 VPS[/CENTER][/B][/COLOR][/FONT]
